pageTitle: Itinerary for Tuesday, May 9, 2017 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Tuesday, May 9, 2017:

Ottawa, Ontario

9:30 a.m. The Prime Minister will attend the Cabinet meeting.

Note for media:

  • Ministers will be available to media in the House of Commons Foyer as of 12:00 p.m.

2:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend Question Period.

7:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend the Asian Heritage Month Reception and deliver remarks.

Sir John A. MacDonald Building
144 Wellington Street
Ottawa, Ontario

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage for remarks
  • Accreditation from the Canadian Parliamentary Press Gallery is required. For more information, contact Marc Fortier at Marc.fortier@parl.gc.ca
